full_summary:
**Weather and Atmospheric Characterization Equipment Request for Proposal**
======================================

**Notice Reference:** WS4430443668
**Solicitation Number:** WS4430443668
**Publication Date:** March 26, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** May 1, 2024 at 14:00:00

**Announcement Description:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Canadian Space Agency (CSA), invites qualified vendors to submit a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a Weather and Atmospheric Characterization Equipment. The procurement includes the delivery, installation, and training of the equipment, to be located at the CSA facilities in Longueuil (St-Hubert), Quebec, Canada.

**Key Procurement Information:**

*   **Procurement Category:** Goods
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements:** None
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** None
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Longueuil, Quebec, Canada

**Contracting Entity Information:**

*   **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
*   **End User Entities Name:** Canadian Space Agency (CSA)
*   **End User Entities Address:** 6767 Route de l'Aéroport, Saint-Hubert, Quebec, J3Y 8Y9, Canada

**Contact Information:**

*   **Contact Name:** Melanie Caty (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Contact Email:** [melanie.caty@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.caty@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19219237?extsite=MTkyMTkyMzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==



**Attachments:** None

**Debriefing/ Feedback Session:**
A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation, which was cancelled and superseded by this RFP.
